content: I love and agree with the idea of space-time being essentially nodes and edges. To me it’s the most logical conclusion, if only because it’s hard to conceive of how it could be deconstructed any further and still maintain conceptual cohesion. I suspect we need a language that can encapsulate this with high resolution notions of dynamic looped, and uncoupling networks to understand it better. Is there any system out there that is moving in that direction? It may well be useful to understand cognition better too.
